external_references.description: Microsoft Threat Intelligence. (2025, March 11). New XCSSET malware adds new obfuscation, persistence techniques to infect Xcode projects. Retrieved April 2, 2025.
Steven Du, Dechao Zhao, Luis Magisa, Ariel Neimond Lazaro. (2021, April 16). XCSSET Quickly Adapts to macOS 11 and M1-based Macs. Retrieved February 18, 2025.

objects.description: [XCSSET](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0658)'s `dfhsebxzod` module searches for `.xcodeproj` directories within the user’s home folder and subdirectories. For each match, it locates the corresponding `project.pbxproj` file and embeds an encoded payload into a build rule, target configuration, or project setting. The payload is later executed during the build process.(Citation: Microsoft March 2025 XCSSET)(Citation: April 2021 TrendMicro XCSSET)
